author: fielding
msg: This file is a proposal for a community contribution license to be
displayed wherever new folks enter the community.  The goal is to make
it difficult for some to claim they didn't know what they were doing
when they submitted code to the forums we host.  Sorry for the length.
It may be sufficient to obviate the need for the longer 2.0 license.
OTOH, something like it is needed regardless of a future change in license.

author: fielding
msg: changed my mind about some of the suggested changes, and improved
others while working on the short version.

author: fielding
msg: Try to address all of the comments (from Drew, Larry Rosen, and
others) received since last March.  I'll do the same for the short

author: fielding
msg: woohoo, point to my own site
